Text: so that's  3543seconds of crap music I'll never have to endure

Dont know if this is correct... but i had no time so i did the math and got this answer... 	
(((1 * 60) + 19) * 60) + 3 = 4743

1h=60m=3600s
19m=1140s
03s=3s

3600s+1140s+3s=4743s

So the correct answer should be 4743 seconds of your life :P
